protocol.name: P-GSE42149-2
protocol.text: Perlite and olive marc compost (OMC) were used as substrates. OMC was produced at the University of Seville (Spain) starting from a 1:1.125 mixture of olive marc and olive tree leaves composted in piles for 19 weeks and then matured for one year.

protocol.name: P-GSE42149-3
protocol.text: Arabidopsis thaliana Col-0 plants were grown in perlite trays in a growth chamber at 22ºC, 70% RH and 8 h/day of 110 µmol m-2 s-1 PPFD. 17 days later, plants were transplanted to individual 60-mL pots containing either OMC or perlite and were maintained until they were 5 weeks old. The plants were watered with half-strength Hoagland solution every other day.

protocol.name: P-GSE42149-4
protocol.text: RNA was extracted from samples ground under liquid nitrogen using SpeedTools Total RNA Extraction kit (Biotools, Madrid, Spain), according to the manufacturer’s instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE42149-5
protocol.text: cDNA library preparation and amplification were performed from 25ng total RNA using WTA2 (Sigma-Aldrich) with 17cycles of amplification. 8µg cDNA were subsequently fragmented by DNAseI and biotinylated by terminal transferase obtained from GeneChip Mapping 10Kv2 Assay Kit (Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE42149-6
protocol.text: Each sample was hybridized to a GeneChip Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array (Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE42149-7
protocol.text: Arrays were scanned in a GeneChip Scanner 3000 (Affymetrix). CEL files were generated from DAT files using GCOS software (Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE42149-8
protocol.text: CEL files were generated from DAT files using GCOS software (Affymetrix). To generate the log2 expression estimates, overall array intensity was normalized between arrays and the probe intensity of all probes in a probe set summarized to a single value using RMA (Robust Multichip Average) algorithm
